homePage.welComStudy: Studying at SITS Information Technology School
homePage.descStudy: SITS Information Technology School is a private educational institution established on June 9, 2021. The school is located in Wat Bo Village, Sala Kamruek Commune, Siem Reap City, Siem Reap Province. The school’s mission is to train computer skills and teach foreign languages with quality education, efficiency, good ethics, and proper behavior, contributing to the development of valuable human resources for society in the future.
homePage.desc1: SITS Information Technology School was established in 2018. The school offers English classes for children aged 7 and above, English for adults, Chinese, Thai, and various computer skills courses.
homePage.desc2: The school’s mission is to provide high-quality education and to develop students’ knowledge, ethics, and both hard and soft skills clearly, so they acquire practical skills that can be applied effectively in everyday life.
homePage.whyStudy: Why study at SITS Information Technology School
homePage.learnFeatures: Learn about the special features at SITS Information Technology School
homePage.question: If You Have Any Question, Please Contact Us

policy.policy1: The information we collect includes: name, address, email, phone number, and other relevant details provided when registering for courses or using services.
policy.policy2: Our school is committed to protect privacy and personal information of students, parents, and website users.
policy.list: Your information will be used for the following purposes:
policy.list2: Providing information about courses or school events
policy.wonder: Your information will not be shared or sold to third parties without your permission. If you wish to update or delete your personal information, you may contact us through the contact page.

history.desc: The Specialized Information Technology School (SITS) is a private educational institution established on November 1, 2018. The school is located in Wat Bo Village, Sala Kamreuk Commune, Siem Reap City, Siem Reap Province. Its mission is to provide training in computer skills such as: Basic Computer, Advanced Excel, Graphic Design and Printing, Video Editing and Production, Drafting, Animation, Facebook Page Management, and Foreign Language Teaching. All these educational programs are carried out with quality, efficiency, ethics, and good behavior to develop valuable human resources for both nation and society.
history.list: The SITS logo is divided into three parts:
history.list1: Top part: The school’s name written in Khmer.
history.list2: Central part: The image of a computer and a human head represents the advancement of technology and the Khmer letters SITS.
history.list3: Bottom part: The school’s name written in English.

visionMissionCoreValue.visionDesc: SITS School of Information Technology has a vision to provide clear and precise skills, giving hope to children, youth, and the public to overcome unemployment with quality, efficiency, and ethics, contributing to social and national economic development.
visionList: To become a leading private educational institution that provides modern knowledge, trains students to be creative, honest, and capable of leadership in the international community.
To become a private school that provides modern education, strengthens ethics, and life skills with responsibility and creativity.
To create a creative learning environment and develop students with full capabilities to become important members of society and the international job market.
To provide quality education, producing outstanding students with positive thinking, honesty, and social and environmental responsibility.
To be a private school that leads in education standards by providing advanced technological knowledge, strengthening ethics, and life skills to meet future social demands.
visionMissionCoreValue.missionDesc: SITS School of Information Technology has set the school's missions to guide, promote, provide services, and deliver skills in a clear and precise manner.
missionList: Provide quality education and promote students to have knowledge, ethics, and life skills.
Strengthen the school community (Unites the School Community).
Align teachers, students, parents, and educational programs toward the same direction.
Train staff to understand and develop according to the school’s desired goals.
Ensure all educational strategies and programs are committed to these missions.
Help school to discover its identity and differentiates from other schools.
Encourage positive thinking and determination for teachers and students.
visionMissionCoreValue.coreValuesDesc: SITS School of Information Technology aims to provide high-quality education in the fields of information technology and English, training students to become capable individuals with vision in the digital society. The school expresses its identity through the following key values:

1.title: Honesty and Professionalism
items: Develop students to be honest and responsible.

2.title: Quality and Reliability
items: All courses are designed to meet students' current and future needs.

3.title: Creativity and Technology
items: Encourage students to acquire new knowledge and skills in information technology.
Use modern technological tools in the learning environment.

4.title: Self-development and Life Skills
items: Provide a learning environment that promotes high student responsibilities for learning.

5.title: Collaboration and Human Management
items: Encourage collaboration among students and teachers.
Train students to respect each other and work as a team.

6.title: Student-focused Educational Services
items: Teach based on understanding each student's needs.
Encourage student participation and adjust teaching methods appropriately.

locationPage.desc: Currently, SITS School of Information Technology is located at Wat Bo Village, Sala Kamreuk Commune, Siem Reap City, Siem Reap Province.
